text: Nowshera Junction railway station (, ) is located in Nowshera city, Nowshera district of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Pakistan Railways website Category:Railway stations in Nowshera District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1) Category:Railway stations on Nowshera–Dargai Railway Line
title: Nowshera Junction railway station
